alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 10 at 11:01AM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 342 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 20 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI COPIAH HINDS MADISON RANKIN SIMPSON SMITH YAZOO IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN MARION IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI COVINGTON LAMAR IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANGUILLA, BASSFIELD, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, COLLINS, COLUMBIA, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DELHI, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, LUMBERTON, MADISON, MAGEE, MAYERSVILLE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MOUNT OLIVE, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, PEARL, PORT GIBSON, PRENTISS, PURVIS, RALEIGH, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, ROXIE, ST. JOSEPH, TALLULAH, TAYLORSVILLE, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WEST HATTIESBURG, WINNSBORO, AND YAZOO CITY.
